findings.title: Integer Overflow in increaseLockTime
findings.explanation: The function increaseLockTime allows a user to add an arbitrary uint to their existing lockTime. If _secondsToIncrease is large enough, the addition will overflow and wrap around, potentially setting lockTime[msg.sender] to a lower value and allowing immediate withdrawal.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use a safe math library for additions (e.g., OpenZeppelin SafeMath) or explicitly check for overflow by requiring that lockTime[msg.sender] + _secondsToIncrease >= lockTime[msg.sender] before updating.
